amendatorysection.chaptername: Cities Of The Second Class And Villages
amendatorysection.catchline: Laws, codes, rules, or regulations; effect of annexation.
amendatorysection.para: Any extraterritorial zoning regulations, property use regulations, or other laws, codes, rules, or regulations imposed upon any annexed lands by the city of the second class or village before such annexation shall continue in full force and effect until otherwise changed.
